text: Justo Tejada Martínez (6 January 1933 – 31 January 2021) was a Spanish footballer. He played as a forward. He played for Spain eight times. He was born in Barcelona, Catalonia. Tejada began playing football with the youth side of CE Europa. He played professionally with FC Barcelona. He won La Liga and the Copa del Rey. He died on 31 January 2021, aged 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Barcelona
title: Justo Tejada
